article_title: QUIZ: Which presidential candidate best matches your views?
article_text:
New Hampshire voters have to pick a presidential candidate Tuesday, but you still have time to decide.



If you’re debating who your favorite candidate is among a crowded field of 10 Democratic and Republican potential nominees, here’s a quiz that might help you out.



From college affordability to tax reform issues, check out how your values and beliefs align with the candidates:
